summary: Sketchtember Day 7  Salvador dual wields and has stuff like cannibalism in his list of crimes, Hydreigon is described as brutal...
caption:
Sketchtember Day 7

Salvador dual wields and has stuff like cannibalism in his list of crimes, Hydreigon is described as brutal pokemon that uses all of it’s heads, including the ones in it’s hands, to attack and devour things… So I felt like that was a fitting match up :V

summary: Pokemon Trading Card Game: Dragon Majesty Expansion Now Available
title: Pokemon Trading Card Game: Dragon Majesty Expansion Now Available
body:
Pokemon Trading Card Game: Dragon Majesty Expansion Now Available

Starting today, fans of the Pokémon Trading Card Game will be able to pick up the latest special expansion, Dragon Majesty. Plus, from 17 September on, Trainers will be able to add Shiny Poipole to their team in Pokémon Ultra Sun or Pokémon Ultra Moon.

True to its name, the Dragon Majesty expansion features a host of draconic Pokémon, including Reshiram-GX, Salamence-GX, Dragonite-GX, and of…

View On WordPress

tags: I re-did the gif since we have 3mb limit now yay
title: #1 one note, one post
body:
This is one of my favorite scenes of the anime, ever. The narration, the music, the animation… So many strong emotions in a short time. I think anyone who had/has a partner like Pikachu knows exactly what is going on Ash’s heart/mind in that moment. I love how that affectionate gesture makes him so vulnerable and, at the same time, full of courage too. 

(one note, one post project)

reblog.comment:
